snippet: Michele Bachmann posts on Buzzfeed the 16 things she’ll miss about being in Congress, subtitled “Macklemore, MSNBC, and Minnesota. A look back at 8 years in Congress.”
abstract: Michele Bachmann posts on Buzzfeed the 16 things she’ll miss about being in Congress, subtitled “Macklemore, MSNBC, and Minnesota. A look back at 8 years in Congress.”

headline.main: Pelosi, Biden and MSNBC: Bachmann Waxes Nostalgic
